title.en: The Useless Saint and the Cursed Holy Knight

altTitles.ja: 役立たず聖女と呪われた聖騎士
役立たず聖女と呪われた聖騎士《思い出づくりで告白したら求婚＆溺愛されました》

altTitles.ja-ro: Yakudatazu Seijo to Norowareta Sei Kishi
Yakudatazu Seijo to Norowareta Sei Kishi: Omoidezukuri de Kokuhaku Shitara Kyuukon to Dekiai Saremashita
Yakudatazu Seijo to Norowareta Sei Kishi "Omoidezukuri de Kokuhaku Shitara Kyuukon & Dekiai saremashita"

altTitles.en: A Useless Saint and a Cursed Paladin: I Confessed to Make Memories but I Was Proposed to Instead

description.en:
Annabel, a saint, carries a healing ability known as "sacred power." However, on an inopportune occasion, her sacred power suddenly and completely reduced. The now-useless Annabel is forced into marriage and her livelihood brought to the cliff's edge. 

To make memories before her marriage, at a flower festival where anyone, regardless of social status can confess, she confesses her love to a knight who happens to pass by! Sometime later, Annabel, who is satisfied from her confession, and Lucas, the knight whom she confessed to, reveal their desires to marry?! But it's to dispel a curse!
description.ja:
癒やしの力「神聖力」を持っている聖女・アナベル。しかしあるきっかけで神聖力が急激に減ってしまう。役立たずになったアナベルは、無理やり結婚を決められ、人生崖っぷち。結婚前に思い出として、身分関係なく愛の告白ができる花祭りで偶然通りかかった聖騎士に告白! 後日、告白だけで満足したアナベルのもとに告白した聖騎士・リュカが結婚してほしいと現れて!? でもそれは呪いを解くためだった! 
神聖力が激減した崖っぷち聖女がイケメン騎士と契約結婚
